japanese: むこうで本を読んでいる少年は私の弟です。
english: The boy who is reading a book over there is my brother.

japanese: これは世界中で人気のある歌です。
english: This is a song which is popular all over the world.

japanese: その速く走ることができる犬は私たちのペットです。
english: The dog that can run fast is our pet.

japanese: 私は毎日勉強する生徒を尊敬します。
english: I respect students who study every day.

japanese: 彼女はいつも私を助けてくれる友人です。
english: She is a friend who always helps me.

japanese: これはとても多くの情報があるウェブサイトです。
english: This is a website which has a lot of information.

japanese: 私は英語を上手に話すことができる人を探しています。
english: I am looking for a person who can speak English well.

japanese: その机の上にある時計を見て。
english: Look at the clock which is on the desk.

japanese: その箱の中にあるおもちゃはあなたへのプレゼントです。
english: The toy that is in the box is a present for you.

japanese: 毎日泳ぐ人々は健康になります。
english: People who swim every day become healthy.

japanese: 私の母が焼いたケーキはとてもおいしかったです。
english: The cake which was baked by my mother was very delicious.

japanese: あれは長い歴史を持っている古い寺です。
english: That is an old temple that has a long history.

japanese: 私は新しいアイデアを出すことができる学生が好きです。
english: I like students who can come up with new ideas.

japanese: 窓のそばに立っている女性は誰ですか。
english: Who is the woman that is standing by the window?

japanese: これは多くの人に愛されている有名な絵です。
english: This is a famous painting which is loved by many people.

japanese: 私たちは私たちを笑わせる物語が好きです。
english: We like stories that make us laugh.

japanese: その公園で遊んでいる子供たちはとても元気です。
english: The children who are playing in the park are very cheerful.

japanese: 私はいつも親切な先生になりたいです。
english: I want to be a teacher who is always kind.

japanese: あの時あなたを呼んだ人は誰ですか。
english: Who was the person that called you then?

japanese: その門の前にある車は新しいです。
english: The car which is in front of the gate is new.

japanese: これは環境に優しい機械です。
english: This is a machine that is kind to the environment.

japanese: 昨日図書館にいた男の子に会いたい。
english: I want to see the boy who was in the library yesterday.

japanese: ここで一番人気があるスポーツは野球です。
english: The sport which is the most popular here is baseball.

japanese: テーブルの上にある本は私のものです。
english: The book which is on the table is mine.

japanese: 私は一生懸命働く人々を尊敬します。
english: I respect people who work very hard.

japanese: 彼女は多くの言語を使える翻訳家です。
english: She is a translator who can use many languages.

japanese: これは水を電気に変えることができる道具です。
english: This is a tool that can change water into electricity.

japanese: 私に話しかけてきた男性は古い友人でした。
english: The man who talked to me was my old friend.

japanese: 彼が描いた絵は美術館に展示されています。
english: The picture which he drew is displayed in the museum.

japanese: あなたはその本を書いた作家を知っていますか。
english: Do you know the writer who wrote the book?

japanese: 私はいつも笑顔の店員が好きです。
english: I like a clerk who is always smiling.

japanese: 昨日届いた手紙はあなた宛てです。
english: The letter which arrived yesterday is for you.

japanese: 彼は困っている人を助ける医者です。
english: He is a doctor who helps people who are in trouble.

japanese: あの山を覆っている雪はとても美しいです。
english: The snow that covers that mountain is very beautiful.

japanese: 私の母が作ったこの料理は健康に良いです。
english: This dish which was cooked by my mother is good for health.

japanese: 私は歌を歌うのが得意な友人がいます。
english: I have a friend who is good at singing songs.

japanese: 私たちは新しい技術を発明する科学者が必要です。
english: We need scientists who invent new technology.

japanese: あの店で売られているシャツは安いです。
english: The shirts which are sold at that store are cheap.

japanese: 私は私に真実を言う人々を信じます。
english: I believe people who tell me the truth.

japanese: あなたは中国で有名なその歌を聴いたことがありますか。
english: Have you heard the song which is famous in China?

japanese: 私は他人の気持ちを理解できる人になりたいです。
english: I want to be a person who can understand others' feelings.

japanese: あのベンチに座っている高齢の女性は私の祖母です。
english: The old woman who is sitting on that bench is my grandmother.

japanese: これは長い間使われている古い道具です。
english: This is an old tool that has been used for a long time.

japanese: 彼はいつも他人に親切な少年です。
english: He is a boy who is always kind to others.

japanese: あの店で売っている靴はとても人気があります。
english: The shoes that are sold at that store are very popular.

japanese: これは私たちに希望を与えてくれる歌です。
english: This is a song that gives us hope.

japanese: 私はいつも約束を守る友達が欲しいです。
english: I want a friend who always keeps promises.

japanese: 私の家の近くにいる犬はいつも吠えています。
english: The dog that is near my house is always barking.

japanese: これは多くの異なる意見がある議論です。
english: This is a discussion which has many different opinions.

japanese: あれは重要な出来事を記録した文書です。
english: That is a document that records important events.

japanese: これは未来を変える力を持つ発明です。
english: This is an invention that has the power to change the future.

japanese: あの本棚にあるすべての本は興味深いです。
english: All the books that are on that bookshelf are interesting.

japanese: 彼女は自分のミスから学ぶことができる人です。
english: She is a person who can learn from her mistakes.

japanese: あの橋を渡っている人々は急いでいます。
english: The people who are crossing that bridge are in a hurry.

japanese: その袋の中に入っている果物は新鮮です。
english: The fruit which is in the bag is fresh.

japanese: 一番早く来た生徒は誰ですか。
english: Who is the student that came earliest?

japanese: 壁にあるそのカレンダーは古いです。
english: The calendar which is on the wall is old.

japanese: 私たちは世界中で歌われているその歌を歌いたいです。
english: We want to sing the song that is sung all over the world.

japanese: 隣の部屋から聞こえる音は何ですか。
english: What is the sound which is coming from the next room?

japanese: この公園にある花はとても良い香りがします。
english: The flowers which are in this park smell very nice.
